text: Achyranthes talbotii is a species of plant in the family Amaranthaceae. It is found in Cameroon and Nigeria. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests and rivers. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Darbyshire, I. 2004. Achyranthes talbotii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. talbotii Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Achyranthes talbotii
